meanings.sent1: The din of the crowded cafeteria made it hard to hear.
meanings.sent2: The din of the traffic outside the window was constant.
meanings.sent3: The din of the children playing in the park was music to her ears.
meanings.sent4: The din of the city streets was like a symphony of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The din of the thunderstorm was both frightening and exhilarating.

meanings.definition: To make a loud, unpleasant noise
meanings.sent1: The construction work din disturbed the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock din woke him up abruptly.
meanings.sent3: The dog din barking kept the whole neighborhood up at night.
meanings.sent4: The car's engine din drowned out their conversation.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks din echoed through the valley.
